job_title: Business Analyst - Product Owner with Ecommerce Domain
jd: From: Maroju, Softcom maroju@softcomsystems.com Reply to: maroju@softcomsystems.com Role: Business Analyst / Product Owner with Ecommerce DomainLocation: Indianapolis, INJob Details:Must Have SkillsExperience in Business Analysis, Requirement Gathering, Product Roadmap planning, Project Management & End user Training. In depth knowledge of ecommerce processes such as Partner Onboarding, Catalog & inventory management, Order fulfillment, Product discovery, Pricing, Digital marketing, Analytics and Search Engine Optimizations.Possess strong stakeholder management expertise to drive business outcomes. Experience in presenting & demonstrating the deliverables to the client and stakeholders ExDetailed Job DescriptionExperience in Business Analysis, Requirement Gathering, Product Roadmap planning, Project Management End user Training. In depth knowledge of ecommerce processes such as Partner Onboarding, Catalog inventory management, Order fulfillment, Product discovery, Pricing, Digital marketing, Analytics and Search Engine Optimizations. Possess strong stakeholder management expertise to drive business outcomes. Experience in presenting demonstrating the deliverables to the client and stakeholders.
